name: Beats by Dr. Dre - Pill Wireless Speaker - Red
description: Beats Pill portable speaker brings the party with you, wherever you go. The Pill is lightweight, portable, and completely wireless. Change tracks from your phone or take a call with the Pill's built-in microphone. New features include the ability to amplify or stereo your music and accessory charging. Small enough to fit in your hand, the Beats Pill surprises with its powerful, signature sound.

name: Beats by Dr. Dre - Tour In-Ear Earphones - Black
description:
Big sound. Small package.

There's a reason you never see artists in the studio with earphones. It's rare to find big sound in something so small. But after years of tinkering, Beats Tour earphones are among the first earbuds to hold their own against on-ear headphones.

Made to stream the soundtrack of your life with perfect, clear sound. Tour headphones were made for music lovers on the move. Three pairs of different-sized ear tips ensure snug fitting buds. Accurate speaker design plays music back loud and full of detail.

Compact and portable.

Beats Tour earphones were made to handle music of all intensities and all volumes, letting you crank it up without distorting the sound.

Tangle-free cable.

Doesn't matter how carefully you wind them up, cords and pockets just don't mix. That's why we've redesigned our cables to make sure they're ultra-flexible and tangle- free.

Adjustable fitting sizes.

Music sounds better when it's delivered right to your eardrum. Different size buds mean you get the perfect fit for your ear, making the audio deeper and more accurate.

Built-in mic for calls.

Switch easily between songs and incoming calls. No need to take off your headphones or talk into the phone like a walkie-talkie.

Features:

- Beats Tour earphones were made to play today's music down to every digital detail. Ultra-fast speaker design reproduces audio with extreme clarity and deep bass
- High-efficiency drivers let your play your music at loud volumes without distorting the sound
- Choose from three sets of ear tips to fit perfectly. Sealed in-ear design means you'll enjoy hearing songs full of accurate detail
- Take calls no matter where you are with the built-in microphone. Talk hands-free with ease
- The on-cable remote means you can adjust volume, hit pause and switch tracks without touching your iPod or iPhone
- Beats by Dr. Dre's famous flat cable design means you won't knot up your Beats Tour headphones when you're on the go
Box Contains
Beats Tour Earphones
In-line remote and mic cable
Hard carry case
3 x pairs of ear tip fittings

name: Beats by Dr. Dre - Studio Headphones - Red
description:
Listen to your music without being tied down with these Beats By Dr. Dre Beats Wireless on-ear headphones that feature a 30' wireless range and easily pair with most Bluetooth-enabled devices. The earcup buttons let you skip songs and more.

Super comfortable thanks to plush breathable materials to keep you cool for long periods of listening. A unique to Beats feature on these headphones is the Beats by Dr. Dre logo on the side acts as a mute button when pressed.

name: Beats by Dr. Dre - Mixr Headphones - Red
description:
Created in partnership with Grammy-Award-winning producer and DJ David Guetta, the Beats by Dr. Dre Mixr headphones give you the best of both worlds with one of the lightest, loudest headphones ever. With swiveling earcups and the ultra-crisp sonic reproduction that made Beats famous, you can monitor your environment without ever compromising your listening experience.

Beats Mixr over ear headphones were made for audio enthusiasts and professionals alike. These on-ear headphones reproduce accurate sound and meet the needs of the world's best DJs. And their super-lightweight design means you can pull them on and off while you're onstage without any trouble.

name: Beats by Dr. Dre - Solo HD with ControlTalk - Red
description:
Beats Solo HD headphones are made from super lightweight materials and feature soft ear cups
Beats Solo HD headphones feature an adjustable headband for optimum comfort
Proprietary titanium coated driver technology ensures that Beats Solo HD headphones accurately reproduce all the details of your music
Controlling volume is fast and easy with the in-line control cable. Adjust music to the level you like without hassle
The unique folding system and lightweight materials make these headphones prepared to handle life on the road

name: Beats by Dr. Dre - Solo HD with ControlTalk - White
description:
Open up an undiscovered world of sound. Hear every sonic detail musicians and recording engineers laid down in the studio with these remarkable Solo's. Normal headphones can't deliver the rich, full sound in today's digital audio tracks, but these high-performance headphones deliver sound so real, you'll be audibly amazed.

Features:

Beats Solo HD.
ControlTalk's built-in mic lets you talk hands-free on your iPhone or music phone.
Cushion ear pieces.
1.2m cord length.
In line volume control.
3.5mm jack with 6.3mm adaptor.
30mm driver.
Carry case.
Gold plated compatible plug.
EAN/MPN/UPC/ISBN: 50644571930.

    For use with portable players, computers and home stereos
    With a total weight of only 147g, you can easily wear them all day

Volume Control

name: Pioneer HDJ 2000
description:
The Pioneer HDJ-2000 features 50 mm driver units and high-flux magnets, creating outstanding resolution, from bass to treble, and are ideal for studio applications. The 3,500 mW of input capacity prevents distortion even at sustained loud volumes. The heavy-duty build of these headphones ensures zero resonance.

Sporting a rugged but lightweight magnesium swivel/fold mechanism, the Pioneer HDJ-2000 headphones are robust, comfortable and compact to transport. Each ear-cup gives excellent insulation and swivels a full 90 degrees using a new i-hinge with auto-return, which presents great flexibility, especially for DJs who prefer the 'on-shoulder' method of monitoring. To improve monitoring, there is also a convenient STEREO/MONO switch. Heat-sensitive, low-rebound urethane-foam (memory-foam) padding with a comfortable protein (synthetic) leather surface cushions the ears and head for a no-fatigue fit.
